body: The latest version of -tags gldebug that is submitted includes checking to make sure there's no concurrency misuse of gl.Context and should make any driver crashes a little clearer. Let me know if you have any luck tracing {Enable,Disable}VertexAttribArray through the logs it generates @momchil-atanasov. It will be many megabytes of output, but if you run it to a file only the last few kilobytes should be relevant.
